key.name: toolbar-style
key.description: Toolbar Style. Valid values are both, both_horiz, icon, and text.

key.name: show-sheet-name
key.summary: Show Sheet Name in Undo List
key.description: This value determines whether to show the sheet names in the undo and redo lists.

key.name: size
key.description: This value determines the length of the undo chain. Each editing action has a size associate with it, to compare it with the memory requirements of a simple one-cell edit (size of 1). The undo list will be truncated when its total size exceeds this configurable value.

key.name: maxnum
key.description: This value determines the maximum number of items in the undo/redo list.

key.name: max-descriptor-width
key.description: This value is indicative of the maximum length of the command descriptors in the undo and redo chains.

key.name: size
key.description: The default font size for new workbooks.

key.name: name
key.description: The default font name for new workbooks.

key.name: bold
key.description: This value determines whether the default font for a new workbook is bold.

key.name: italic
key.description: This value determines whether the default font for a new workbook is italic.

key.name: n-sheet
key.description: The number of sheets initially created in a new workbook.

key.name: n-rows
key.summary: Default Number of rows in a sheet
key.description: The number of rows in each sheet. This setting will be used only in a new gnumeric session.

key.name: n-cols
key.summary: Default Number of columns in a sheet
key.description: The number of columns in each sheet. This setting will be used only in a new gnumeric session.

key.name: autosave-time
key.description: The number of seconds between autosaves.

key.name: horizontaldpi
key.description: Screen resolution in the horizontal direction.

key.name: verticaldpi
key.description: Screen resolution in the vertical direction.

key.name: standard-visible
key.description: This variable determines whether the standard toolbar should be visible initially.

key.name: standard-position
key.description: This variable determines where the standard toolbar should be shown. 0 is left, 1 is right, 2 is top.

key.name: format-visible
key.description: This variable determines whether the format toolbar should be visible initially.

key.name: format-position
key.description: This variable determines where the format toolbar should be shown. 0 is left, 1 is right, 2 is top.

key.name: object-visible
key.description: This variable determines whether the object toolbar should be visible initially.

key.name: object-position
key.description: This variable determines where the object toolbar should be shown. 0 is left, 1 is right, 2 is top.

key.name: function-markers
key.description: This variable determines whether cells containing spreadsheet function are marked.

key.name: extension-markers
key.description: This variable determines whether cells with truncated content are marked.

key.name: autocomplete
key.description: This variable determines whether autocompletion is set on.

key.name: autocomplete-min-chars
key.summary: Minimum Number of Characters for Autocompletion
key.description: This variable determines the minimum number of characters required for autocompletion.

key.name: function-name-tooltips
key.description: This variable determines whether to show function name tooltips.

key.name: function-argument-tooltips
key.description: This variable determines whether to show function argument tooltips.

key.name: enter-moves-dir
key.description: Which direction pressing Enter will move the edit position.

key.name: recalclag
key.description: If `lag' is 0, gnumeric recalculates all auto expressions immediately after every change. Non-zero values of `lag' allow gnumeric to accumulate more changes before each recalculation. If `lag' is positive, then whenever a change appears, gnumeric waits `lag' milliseconds and then recalculates; if more changes appear during that period, they are also processed at that time. If `lag' is negative, then recalculation happens only after a quiet period of |lag| milliseconds.

key.name: transitionkeys
key.description: This variable determines whether transition keys are set on. Transition keys are a throw back to 1-2-3 style event handling. They turn Ctrl-arrow into page movement rather than jumping to the start/end of series.

key.name: x
key.description: This number (between 0.25 and 1.00) gives the horizontal fraction of the screen size covered by the default window.

key.name: y
key.description: This number (between 0.25 and 1.00) gives the vertical fraction of the screen size covered by the default window.

key.name: zoom
key.description: The initial zoom factor for new workbooks.

key.name: compression-level
key.summary: Default Compression Level For Gnumeric Files
key.description: This integer (between 0 and 9) specifies the amount of compression performed by Gnumeric when saving files in the default file format. 0 is minimal compression while 9 is maximal compression.

key.name: single-sheet
key.summary: Warn When Exporting Into Single Sheet Format
key.description: Some file formats can contain only a single sheet. This variable determines whether the user will be warned if only a single sheet of a multi-sheet workbook is being saved.

key.name: def-overwrite
key.description: Before an existing file is being overwritten, gnumeric will present a warning dialog. Setting this option will make the overwrite button in that dialog the default button.

key.name: extension-check-disabled
key.summary: List of file savers with disabled extension check.
key.description: This list contains the ids of the file savers for which the extension check is disabled.

key.name: by-case
key.description: Setting this option will cause the sort buttons on the toolbar to perform a case-sensitive sort and determine the initial state of the case-sensitive checkbox in the sort dialog.

key.name: retain-formats
key.description: Setting this option will cause the sort buttons on the toolbar to preserve the cell formats while sorting and determines the initial state of the preserve-formats checkbox in the sort dialog.

key.name: ascending
key.description: This option determines the initial state of the sort-order button in the sort dialog.

key.name: max-initial-clauses
key.description: When selecting a sort region in the sort dialog, sort clauses are automatically added. This number determines the maximum number of clauses to be added automatically.

key.name: prefer-clipboard
key.description: When TRUE, Gnumeric will prefer the modern CLIPBOARD selection over the legacy PRIMARY selections. Set to FALSE if you have to deal with older applications, like Xterm or Emacs, which set only the PRIMARY selection.
